summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from June 2019 arranging a conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case. The participants include FBI personnel from the Violent Crimes Task Force and Victim Services Division, specifically the Child Victim Services Unit, indicating coordination for interviewing victims.

events.title: Epstein victim interviews conference call
events.description: A scheduled unclassified conference call to discuss victim interviews in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force and Victim Services Division were coordinating a conference call in June 2019 to discuss interviewing victims in the Epstein case.
The call was scheduled for June 28, 2019, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
The correspondence involves FBI personnel, including a Child/Adolescent Forensic Interviewer from the Child Victim Services Unit.
Multiple email addresses and names are redacted, indicating the involvement of several law enforcement officials whose identities are protected.
